title: A Doll Like Me
description: Meet Mia an 8-year-old with many great ideas. With the help of her friends and family members, she is able to develop one of them into an exciting new venture. Experience the excitement of starting a new business with Mia and her team.A Doll Like Me is an empowering tale of representation, teamwork, and an adult getting a great idea from a child. When Mia comes up with a new idea, her support team of family and friends work together and create something bigger than anyone ever expected.
author: Kimberly  Gordon
